channel.title: BUbreakingHeadlines
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbreakingHeadlines, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Boebert questions if US moon landing was real as bizarre ‘tin-foil hat’ interview goes off the rails

Trump says he'd like to see facilities like 'Alligator Alcatraz' in 'many states'
item.description: Trump is visiting the new "Alligator Alcatraz" migrant detention center in Florida's Everglades on Tuesday.

item.title: 5 smart ways to use $100,000 in home equity right now
item.description: Thinking about tapping $100,000 in home equity? These strategies could help grow your wealth — or protect it.

item.title: WATCH: Racetrack crowns T. rex racing champions
item.description: Organizers say over 300 competitors took place in the "rex-cellent" events.

item.title: Over 100 charities and NGOs call for end of controversial Gaza aid group
item.description: 130 humanitarian organizations are calling for the Gaza Humanitarian Foundation to be shut down. CBS News foreign correspondent Debora Patta reports.

item.title: HHS layoffs were likely unlawful and must be halted, US judge says
item.description: Executive branch doesn't have authority to change agencies created by Congress.

item.title: WATCH: Eiffel Tower closes early amid European heat wave
item.description: Temperatures in Paris are expected to reach 38.3 degrees Celsius, approximately 101 degrees Fahrenheit, on Tuesday.

item.title: The best job markets in the U.S., according to SmartAsset study
item.description: New study​ ranks the best job markets in the U.S. based on commute times, access to employer health insurance and other factors.
